data.text:
Happy Diwali Guyana. We hope this RElaxing day brings you every joy and beautiful blessings! 

#REcalibrated #iflycaribbean ✈️ https://t.co/VGSpRr3X5Z

@judelegendre Hello @judelegendre  and thank you for your shared feedback.  Please note that we have shared  same with the relevant department toward performance evaluation and improvement.   Hope you are keeping safe, we look forward to welcoming you on board with us soon.  
-Essy

@ReqLessRique Hi @ReqLessRique. We have received your feedback we'd love the opportunity to understand and assist further. Kindly reach out to us via Direct Message with further details so that we may share same with our Team. Please also share privately your contact info. Thank you.
- Essy

@TrulyKeels Good day @TrulyKeels. We truly do apologize for the inconvenience caused. We'd love the opportunity to understand and assist further. Kindly reach out to us via Direct Message by sharing privately your phone/ e-mail details so that we may connect with you. Thank you - Essy

https://t.co/oJqMsNyi6E

@MaxPayneV3 Good evening @MaxPayneV3 . We'd love the opportunity to understand and assist further. Direct Message with further details so that we may share same with our teams. Do share your phone/ e-mail details so that we may connect with you.   
- Essy

-Essy
